news.content: Our follow up paper of our project vdm4cdm_2d is on [arxiv](https://arxiv.org/abs/2403.10648).

I gave a [talk](https://youtu.be/kYs1ZQWqz5U?t=3393) about our project vdm4cdm_2d at the [ITC](https://itc.cfa.harvard.edu/) Luncheon: 'Debiasing with Diffusion: Probabilistic reconstruction of Dark Matter field from galaxies'

I gave a quick presentation of our project vdm4cdm_3d on using Diffusion Models to generate dark matter fields at the [workshop](https://cd3.ipmu.jp/ai4phys/) 'AI-driven Discovery in Physics and Astrophysics' at [Kavli IPMU](https://www.ipmu.jp/).
